entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Sydney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:02 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 6.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: J.A. Douglas McCurdy Sydney Airport 6:52 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 6.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 6.2°C
Wind: SSW 31 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 40 gusting to 70 early this evening. Temperature rising to 9 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches. Amount 10 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Amount 15 mm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023
